Row.Text: The seat of the Cultural Committee. Gives one Delegate and allows you to see the winners of the cultural capital election.
[ICON_CC]Culture Committee
A City receives this building upon forming the [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Committee[ENDCOLOR].
You receive a free policy.
[ICON_CC]Statue of Empowerment
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Empowerment[ENDCOLOR].
All nearby tiles provide +1[ICON_PEACE] Faith.
[ICON_CC]Beacon of Heavens
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Ascendancy[ENDCOLOR].
Grants +2[ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +2[ICON_PEACE] Faith.
[ICON_CC]Temple of Worship
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Belief[ENDCOLOR].
Grants +3[ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +3[ICON_PEACE] Faith. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST]1 Artist Specialist and contains 1[ICON_GREAT_WORK] slot for a Great Work of Art.
[ICON_CC]Imperial Cathedral
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Faith[ENDCOLOR].

Temporarily raises [ICON_HAPPINESS_4]Unhappiness from Number of Cities by 100%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases Birth Rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great People and [ICON_CULTURE]Culture Output of all Cities in the Empire by 150%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases for its duration the Birth Rate of [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST]Great Artists by 3.
[ICON_CC]Exhibition of Controversy
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Controversy[ENDCOLOR].
Increases Output of Forest and Jungle Features by +1[ICON_FOOD] Food and Oasis Features by +2[ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Water Tiles yield +2[ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
[ICON_CC]Ecological Center
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Ecology[ENDCOLOR].

Boosts base Production by +1[ICON_PRODUCTION], [ICON_PRODUCTION]Building Production and [ICON_WAR]Siege Unit Production by +15%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides +2[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production after Steam Power researched.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_ENGINEER]2 Engineer Specialists.
[ICON_CC]Construction Hall
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Construction[ENDCOLOR].

Increases the Birth Rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE]Great People by 15% and the Research Output by +15 %[ICON_RESEARCH].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides +3[ICON_RESEARCH] Science after Scientific Theory researched.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_WRITER]1 Great Writer and contains a slot for 1[ICON_GREAT_WORK] Great Work of Literature.
[ICON_CC]Think Tank
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Philosophy[ENDCOLOR].

Land- and Sea Trade-routes[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] reach 25% farther and give +2[ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2[ICON_FOOD] Food production in the City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides +2[ICON_GOLD] Gold after Economics researched.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_MERCHANT]2 Merchant Specialists.
[ICON_CC]Trading House
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Trade[ENDCOLOR].

All [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST]Artist, [ICON_GREAT_WRITER]Writers and [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN]Musicians Specialists in the Empire yield +1[ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST]3 Artist Specialists and gives 2[ICON_GREAT_WORK] slots for Great Works of Art.
[ICON_CC]Ars Technica
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Technology[ENDCOLOR].
Adds +7.5[ICON_STRENGTH] Defense, +1[ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture to the City.
[ICON_CC]Palisade
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Defense[ENDCOLOR].
Adds +13.5[ICON_STRENGTH] Defense to the City and increases the Research Output of the City by +50%[ICON_RESEARCH].
[ICON_CC]Bunker
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Adv. Defense[ENDCOLOR].
All newly built [ICON_WAR]Units receive +15 Experience and boosts [ICON_WAR]Unit Production by 25%[ICON_PRODUCTION].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases Culture Output by +1[ICON_CULTURE].
[ICON_CC]Memorial
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Idols[ENDCOLOR].
Boosts the Income from [ICON_TRADE]City Connections by 10%[ICON_GOLD].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides 1[ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route.
[ICON_CC]Exchange Market
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Exchange[ENDCOLOR].

[ICON_RES_STONE][ICON_RES_GEMS][ICON_RES_GOLD][ICON_RES_SILVER][ICON_RES_MARBLE][ICON_RES_PEARLS][ICON_RES_SALT][ICON_RES_IRON][ICON_RES_COPPER][ICON_RES_COAL][ICON_RES_ALUMINUM][ICON_RES_URANIUM] Resources yield +2[ICON_SCIENCE] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides +1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture from every Type of these Resources near the City. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_ARTIST]1 Artist Specialists and gives 2[ICON_GREAT_WORK] slots for Great Works of Art.
[ICON_CC]Geology Museum
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Geology[ENDCOLOR].

Grants +4[ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases Gold Output of the City by [ICON_GOLD]+25%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can employ [ICON_GREAT_MUSICIAN]3 Musicians and provides 3[ICON_GREAT_WORK] Great Works of Music slots.
[ICON_CC]Radio Studio
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Entertainment[ENDCOLOR].
Temporarily increases the Work Speed of all Workers by 200% in the Empire.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases the Birth Rate of [ICON_GREAT_ENGINEER]Great Engineers by 2.
[ICON_CC]Labor Camp
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Labor[ENDCOLOR].
You receive a free [ICON_SPY]Spy. Provides +1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
[ICON_CC]Labor Camp
A City receives this building upon adoption of the Theme [COLOR_YELLOW]Cultural Capital of Investigation[ENDCOLOR].
